allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add celebration screen and Mediterranean Earth color palette

- Add celebratory confirmation page after saving entries with elegant animations
- Complete color scheme overhaul to Mediterranean Earth tones \(terracotta, olive, warm sand\)
- Entry clicks now take priority over themes when both exist on same day
- Press ''c'' to preview celebration animation \(dev shortcut\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
